title: Kimochi no Katachi
original_name: きもちのかたち 桜井家作品集
sinopse: Takenaka Satsuki, first year high school student and Library assistant, is secretly attracted to her Senpai, Kitamura Kano. With the help of an accepting friend, Satsuki must learn to overcome her own sense of what is 'normal' in order to embrace her feelings for the one she loves.
